pullRequest.title: Improvements to the UI of Privileges and Categories screens
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds some improvements to the batch editing screens for 'Privileges' and 'Categories'.
The changes:

replace the * with the minus symbol (-) for a change/deletion
added a + symbol for when a new privilege/category is selected
change add selected with append selected
additional help/description
the reset button is only enabled when something has changed in the screen
similar tooltips on both screens

Improved help texts for privileges and categories screens, `reset` is disabled when there's no selection.
